text: Cesar Enrique Aguinaldo Virata (born 12 December 1930)Profile of Cesar Virata is a Filipino politician. He was Prime Minister of the Philippines from June 30 1981 to February 25 1986 and Finance minister from 1984 to 1986. == Other websites == * Aquino Abolishes Assembly, Declares Interim Government ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino autobiographers Category:Prime ministers of the Philippines
title: Cesar Virata
